==Events==
* [[627]] &ndash; [[Battle of Nineveh (627)|Battle of Nineveh]]: A [[Byzantine Empire|Byzantine]] army under Emperor [[Heraclius]] defeats Emperor [[Khosrau II]]'s [[Sasanian Empire|Persian]] forces, commanded by [[Rhahzadh|General Rhahzadh]].
*[[1098]] &ndash; [[First Crusade]]: [[Siege of Ma'arrat al-Numan]] &ndash; Crusaders breach the town's walls and massacre about 20,000 inhabitants. After finding themselves with insufficient food, they reportedly resort to [[cannibalism]].
*[[1388]] &ndash; Maria of Enghien sells the lordship of [[Argos and Nauplia]] to the [[Republic of Venice]].
*[[1408]] &ndash; The [[Order of the Dragon]] a [[Chivalric order#Monarchical or dynastical orders|monarchical chivalric order]] is created by [[Sigismund, Holy Roman Emperor|Sigismund of Luxembourg]], then King of Hungary.
*[[1781]] &ndash; [[American Revolutionary War]]: [[Second Battle of Ushant]] &ndash; A British fleet led by {{HMS|Victory}} defeats a [[France|French]] fleet.
*[[1787]] &ndash; [[Pennsylvania]] becomes the second state to ratify the [[United States Constitution]], five days after [[Delaware]] became the first.
*[[1862]] &ndash; {{USS|Cairo}} sinks on the [[Yazoo River]], becoming the first armored ship to be sunk by an electrically detonated mine.
*[[1870]] &ndash; [[Joseph H. Rainey]] of [[South Carolina]] becomes the second black [[Congress of the United States|U.S. congressman]], the first being [[Hiram Revels]].
*[[1897]] &ndash; [[Belo Horizonte]], the first [[planned city]] in [[Brazil]], is founded.
*[[1901]] &ndash; [[Guglielmo Marconi]] receives the first [[Atlantic Ocean|transatlantic]] [[radio]] signal (the letter "S" [***] in Morse Code), at [[Signal Hill, Newfoundland and Labrador|Signal Hill]] in [[St John's, Newfoundland]].
*[[1911]] &ndash; [[Delhi]] replaces [[Calcutta]] as the capital of [[India]].
*  1911   &ndash; King [[George V of the United Kingdom|George V]] and [[Mary of Teck]] are enthroned as [[Emperor of India|Emperor]] and [[Empress of India]].
*[[1915]] &ndash; President of the [[Republic of China]], [[Yuan Shikai]], announces his intention to reinstate the monarchy and proclaim himself [[Emperor of China]].
*[[1917]] &ndash; In [[Nebraska]], Father [[Edward J. Flanagan]] founds [[Girls and Boys Town|Boys Town]] as a farm village for wayward boys.
*[[1918]] &ndash; The [[Flag of Estonia]] is raised atop the [[Pikk Hermann]] for the first time.
*[[1925]] &ndash; The [[Majlis of Iran]] votes to crown [[Reza Shah Pahlavi|Reza Khan]] as the new [[Shah of Iran]], starting the [[Pahlavi dynasty]].
*[[1935]] &ndash; [[Lebensborn]] Project, a Nazi reproduction program, is founded by [[Heinrich Himmler]].
*[[1936]] &ndash; [[Xi'an Incident]]: The [[Generalissimo]] of the [[Republic of China]], [[Chiang Kai-shek]], is kidnapped by [[Zhang Xueliang]].
*[[1937]] &ndash; [[Second Sino-Japanese War]]: [[USS Panay incident|USS ''Panay'' incident]] &ndash; [[Imperial Japan|Japanese]] aircraft bomb and sink U.S. gunboat {{USS|Panay|PR-5|6}} on the [[Yangtze River]] in [[China]].
*[[1939]] &ndash; [[Winter War]]: [[Battle of Tolvajärvi]] &ndash; [[Finland|Finnish]] forces defeat those of the [[Soviet Union]] in their first major victory of the conflict.
*  1939   &ndash; {{HMS|Duchess|H64|6}} sinks after a collision with {{HMS|Barham|04|6}} off the coast of [[Scotland]] with the loss of 124 men.
*[[1940]] &ndash; [[World War II]]: Approximately [[Fitzalan Square#The Marples tragedy|70 people are killed in the Marples Hotel]], [[Fitzalan Square]], [[Sheffield]], as a result of a [[Sheffield Blitz|German air raid]].
*[[1941]] &ndash; World War II: Fifty-four [[Empire of Japan|Japanese]] [[A6M Zero]] fighters raid [[Batangas]] Field, [[Philippines]]. [[Jesús Villamor]] and four [[Philippine|Filipino]] fighter pilots fend them off; [[César Basa]] is killed.
*  1941   &ndash; World War II: [[United States Marine Corps|USMC]] [[F4F Wildcat|F4F "Wildcats"]] sink the first 4 major Japanese ships off [[Wake Island]].
*  1941   &ndash; World War II: The [[United Kingdom]] declares war on [[Bulgaria]]. [[Hungary]] and [[Romania]] declare war on the [[United States]]. [[India]] declares war on [[Japan]].
*  1941   &ndash; [[Adolf Hitler]] declares the imminent extermination of the Jews at a [[Reich Chancellery meeting of 12 December 1941|meeting in the Reich Chancellery]]
*[[1942]] &ndash; World War II: German troops begin [[Operation Winter Storm]], an attempt to relieve [[encirclement|encircled]] Axis forces during the [[Battle of Stalingrad]].
*  1942   &ndash; A fire in a hostel in [[St. John's, Newfoundland]], kills 100 people.
*[[1946]] &ndash; A fire at a [[New York City]] ice plant spreads to a nearby tenement, killing 37 people.
*[[1948]] &ndash; [[Malayan Emergency]]: [[Batang Kali Massacre]] &ndash; 14 members of the [[Scots Guards]] stationed in [[Malay Peninsula|Malaya]] allegedly massacre 24 unarmed civilians and set fire to the village.
*[[1950]] &ndash; [[Paula Ackerman]], the first woman appointed to perform [[rabbi]]nical functions in the [[United States]], leads the congregation in her first services.
*[[1956]] &ndash; Beginning of the [[Irish Republican Army (1922–1969)|Irish Republican Army]]'s "[[Border Campaign (Irish Republican Army)|Border Campaign]]".
*[[1958]] &ndash; [[Guinea]] joins the [[United Nations]].
*[[1963]] &ndash; [[Kenya]] gains its independence from the [[United Kingdom]].
*[[1964]] &ndash; Prime Minister [[Jomo Kenyatta]] becomes the first [[Heads of State of Kenya|President]] of the [[Kenya|Republic of Kenya]].
*[[1969]] &ndash; [[Years of Lead (Italy)|Years of Lead]]: [[Piazza Fontana bombing]] &ndash; The offices of Banca Nazionale dell'Agricoltura in Piazza Fontana, [[Milan]], are bombed.
*[[1979]] &ndash; [[Coup d'état of December Twelfth]]: [[South Korean]] Army Major General [[Chun Doo-hwan]] orders the arrest of Army Chief of Staff General [[Jeong Seung-hwa]] without authorization from President [[Choi Kyu-ha]], alleging involvement in the assassination of ex-President [[Park Chung Hee]].
*  1979   &ndash; President of [[Pakistan]] [[Zia-ul-Haq]] confers ''[[Nishan-e-Imtiaz]]'' on Nobel laureate Dr [[Abdus Salam]].
*  1979   &ndash; The unrecognised state of [[Zimbabwe Rhodesia]] returns to British control and resumes using the name [[Southern Rhodesia]].
*[[1983]] &ndash; The [[Australian]] Labor government led by Prime Minister [[Bob Hawke]] and Treasurer [[Paul Keating]] floats the [[Australian dollar]].
*[[1984]] &ndash; [[Maaouiya Ould Sid'Ahmed Taya]] becomes the third president of [[Mauritania]] after a [[coup d'état]] against [[Mohamed Khouna Ould Haidalla]] while the latter is attending a summit.
*[[1985]] &ndash; [[Arrow Air Flight 1285]], a [[Douglas DC-8|McDonnell Douglas DC-8]], crashes after takeoff in [[Gander, Newfoundland and Labrador|Gander]], [[Newfoundland and Labrador|Newfoundland]], killing all 256 people on board, including 236 members of the [[United States Army]]'s [[101st Airborne Division]].
*[[1988]] &ndash; The [[Clapham Junction rail crash]] kills thirty-five and injures hundreds after two collisions of three commuter trains&mdash;one of the worst train crashes in the United Kingdom.
*[[1991]] &ndash; The [[Russia|Russian Federation]] gains independence from the [[Soviet Union|USSR]].
*[[2000]] &ndash; The [[Supreme Court of the United States|United States Supreme Court]] releases its decision in ''[[Bush v. Gore]]''.
*[[2001]] &ndash; [[Prime Minister of Vietnam]] [[Phan Văn Khải]] announces the decision on upgrading Phong Nha–Kẻ Bàng to the [[Phong Nha-Kẻ Bàng National Park]], providing information on projects for the conservation and development of the park and revised maps.
*[[2012]] &ndash; [[North Korea]] successfully [[Timeline of first orbital launches by country|launches its first satellite]], [[Kwangmyŏngsŏng-3 Unit 2]], using a [[Unha|Unha-3]] carrier rocket.
*  2012   &ndash; [[12-12-12: The Concert for Sandy Relief]] took place at [[Madison Square Garden]] and was broadcast on 20 international television networks to raise money for the victims of [[Hurricane Sandy]].
